title: Adams National Historical Park: Get Involved
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved           Get Involved       Are you looking for a way to get involved with your Nationals Parks?  If so, you should check out the Branching Out program with the Olmsted Center for Landscape Preservation.  Branching Out is an excellent way to get youth and teenagers involved with the National Park Service and their local communities.  This includes Adams National Historical Park!  Branching Out interns in 2013 created this video below.  If you look closely you can spot Adams National Historical Park and Gardener Leader Bob Mackenzie in the video!  Â           Branching Out: Youth Exploring Landscape Stewardship   Loading the player...       Visit JWPlayer docs for keyboard shortcuts  Duration:3 minutes, 45 seconds  A video by Branching Out interns about the joys of finding your National Parks.
